Content:: J. R. P. Suriyapperuma (born 8 June 1928) is a Sri Lankan politician, and a National List member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka. Suriyapperuma is the chief organiser of the Dedigama electorate in the Kegalle District for the Sri Lanka Freedom Party.[1]  This article about a politician from Sabaragamuwa Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
